moves.1. d4 d5 2. c4 e5: in my wild days, I used to play this a lot against the Queens' Pawn Gambit: Albins' Counter Gambit...
moves.3. dxe5: another gambit, one should best refuse...
moves.3... d4 4. e3: never attack a gambit pawn: best is probably a3...
moves.4... Bb4+ 5. Bd2 dxe3 6. Bxb4: ugly, but best is probably fxe3, Qh4+, g3, and hope for the best...
moves.6... exf2+: a nasty surprise: after Kxf2, Qxd1...
moves.8. Nf3 Nc6: time to bring in another piece...
moves.10. Kxd1 O-O-O+: although a piece for a pawn behind, Black is totally winning...
moves.11. Kc2: Ke2 is no option: it hinders both Bf1 and Nf3...
moves.12. h3: not sure, if this is best: Black has all the play...
moves.12... Bf5+ 13. Kb3: a tough decision for White: Kc1 is bad...
moves.13... Be6: making it up, as we go along...
moves.15. g4 Nfd4+: forcing Bxd4: the White King has no safe moves...
moves.16. Bxd4 Nxd4+ 17. Kc3: again forced: Nc2 cannot be allowed...
moves.17... h6: like clockwork: Ng5 has to buckle...
moves.18. Nxe6 fxe6: opening up a line to f2: the pride of our position...
moves.21. Kc2: White needs to look after Nd2...
moves.24. Kc3: probably the safest, while covering Nd2...
moves.24... c5: preparing Rd4, and break up the center...
moves.25. Raxe1: White needs to find a way, to release his pieces: this might be best...
moves.25... fxe1=Q 26. Rxe1 Rf2 27. Rd1: forced: after Nf3/Nb3, follows Rdd2, and Blacks' rooks have entered the White building...
moves.28. Bd3: the only one, to prevent more mayhem...
moves.28... Rxh3 29. Ne4: White is hanging by a thread...
moves.29... b6: tying up, the last loose ends...
outplaying the Knight: Nf4 is no longer an option...
moves.36. a3 Ra2 37. a4 Rh7 38. Ng6 h5 39. Nf4: not quite, what White had hoped for: Blacks' free pawns will close this deal...
moves.41. Bg8 Re2 42. Bxe6 Rxe5 43. Bxg4 Re3+: creeping up on White: Kc3 is impossible, due to f3-f2+...
moves.47. Kc2 Kb4 48. Kb2 f2: the winning move: Rg1 will always grant promotion...
moves.49. Rd2 Rf3 50. Bg2 Rf7: tidying up the last loose ends...
